chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: The Rackspace &CImS; offers retrieval, storage, and metadata assignment for images through a simple Representational State Transfer (REST) web service interface.

section.title: Intended Audience
section.para: This guide is intended to assist software developers who want to develop applications by using the Rackspace &CImS; application programming interface API. It fully documents the REST (API), which enables developers to interact with the storage components of the &CImS;. To use the information provided here, you should have a general understanding of the &CImS; and have access to an installation of the &CImS;.
